revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Salle d'Arcade Rocket |image = [[File:Rocket Game Corner.png|thumb]] |caption = Une carte en vue aérienne de la Salle d'Arcade Rocket. |tokens = 625 |location = Céladopole. }} La '''Salle d'Arcade Rocket''' est un [[Dungeons/fr|donjon]] de [[Kanto]]. Ce donjon a 25 cases arrangées dans un carré 5x5, qui incluent 5 cases de coffre, 13 cases de rencontres avec des Pokémon sauvages (hors boss), et 1 case de rencontre de boss. Les rencontres sauvages ont 5 820 PV. == Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages === {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon Sauvages !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Rencontres !! Dresseurs !! Équipe Pokémon |- | rowspan=21|
N/A || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Soporifik, [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machoc |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Rattatac, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Rattatac |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Rattatac, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Rattatac, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Tadmorv, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Smogo, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Smogo |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Tadmorv, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Smogo |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Nosferapti, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Smogo, [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Tadmorv, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Nosferapti, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Rattatac |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machoc, [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machoc |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Rattatac, [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Soporifik |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Sbire Rocket || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Nosferapti, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Smogo |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sabelette, [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Abo, [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sablaireau |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Abo, [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sabelette, [[File:Arbok.png|40px]] Arbok |} ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Objet de coffre !! Poids !! Complétion 0 fois !! Complétion 100 fois !! Complétion 500 fois |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Commun''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack|Attaque +}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense|Encens Vein}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard|Tesson Bleu}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard|Tesson Jaune}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Épique''' |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball|Poké Ball}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Légendaire''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball|Super Ball}} || 2 || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Revive|Rappel}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Nestball|Faiblo Ball}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythique''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive|Rappel Max}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece|Morceau d'Étoile}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} {{Kanto Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #1 - Kanto^e]] [[Category:Donjons|^Région #1 - Kanto^e]]
